markReceivedLongPress: Long Press to Mark Order {order_id} as Received
markCancelledLongPress: Long Press to Cancel this Order {order_id}
markReturnedLongPress: Long Press to Return this Order {order_id}
welcomeMessage: You can now start shopping using on of the following options. They are as follows
voiceSearchLongPress: Long Press to Select Voice Search
voiceSearchHint: Shop Items and Search for Items based on Voice
imageSearchLongPress: Long Press to Select Image Search
imageSearchHint: Shop Items and Search for Items based on Grocery List Images
productListSearchLongPress: Long Press to Select Product List Search
productListSearchHint: See your existing Item Lists and Search and Shop based on them
profileHint: View and Edit your Profile details to help your shop
assistantHint: Access the assistant of the application to aid with your shopping experience
micMenuLabel: Long Press to choose a menu option through voice
chooseLanguageAudio: Choose a Language to start shopping, Either English or Tamil.
btnAlterLongPress: Long Press to Alter the Created List.
btnSaveLongPress: Long Press to Save the Created List.
btnContinueLongPress: Long Press to Continue Searching using the Created List.
btnReadLongPress: Long Press to Read the Created List.
voiceSearchTts: Welcome to Voice Search. You can now start searching and adding items to your cart.
btnAvailabilityLongPress: Long Press to check order availability against nearest shops
micMenuVoiceSearch: Start talking to Select an Option
voiceSearchPharmaTts: You can see the Pharmaceutical Items and Prescription Items in your chosen set of Items to place an order.
pharmaProceedText: You may not proceed with items that require prescriptions
btnPlaceOrderLongPress: Long Press to Continue to Place Order
placeOrderTts: You may place your Order now
btnConfirmOrderLongPress: Long Press to Confirm and Place Order
orderConfirmTts: You can confirm your order to proceed to the next step. The items in your order are as follows and the total amount is {total}
btnMenuLongPress: Click to Go Back to Main Menu
feedbackLabelHint: Type in your feedback regarding the order you placed and/or the shopping experience
saveFeedbackLabelHint: Confirm Feedback for the Order you placed.
orderSuccessText: Your order has been placed succesfully
voiceAssistantTts: Welcome to Voice Assistant. You can find coupons, find offers and view orders.
voiceAssistantOffersNearMeHint: See offers that are available in shops near me
voiceAssistantProfileHint: View and Make Changes to my Profile
voiceAssistantOrderHint: View all your ongoing, completed and cancelled Orders
allCouponsTts: You can view all your Coupons
allOffersTts: You can view all Offers near you
allOrdersTts: Select one of the three types of Orders: Completed, Cancelled or Pending Orders
editProfileLabelHint: You may change your profile values and edit them
updateProfileButtonHint: Long press to Update your Profile
couponValueLabelHint: This is a Coupon with Code {coupon_code}
pendingOrdersLongPress: Long Press to View all Pending Orders
completedOrdersLongPress: Long Press to View all Completed Orders
cancelledOrdersLongPress: Long Press to View all Cancelled Orders
markOrderCancelledTts: Mark the Order with Number {order_id} as Cancelled
markOrderReturnedTts: Mark the Order with Number {order_id} as Returned
markorderReceivedTts: Mark the Order with Number {order_id} as Received
cancelOrderTextHint: You are Cancelling Order #{order_id} and the items that the order contains.
reviewOrderTextHint: You are Reviewing Order #{order_id} and the items that the order contains.
returnOrderTextHint: You are Returning Order #{order_id} and the items that the order contains.
cancelHint: Type in your reason for cancelling this Order #{order_id}
reviewHint: Type in your review regarding the product as you have received this Order #{order_id}
returnHint: Type in your reason for returning this Order #{order_id}
orderDetailInfo: Order Number {order_id} from Shop {shop_name} for a Total of {currency}.{total} with {length} Items.
permissionCameraMessage: We need your permission to use your camera.
permissionAduioMessage: We need your permission to use your audio
saveChangesButtonHint: Save the loaded list from Image
takePictureButtonHint: Take a Picture of your Grocery List
uploadPictureButtonHint: Load a Picture of your Grocery List from your Gallery
pendingOrdersListTts: You are now looking at Pending Orders. Your Pending orders are as follows:
completedOrdersListTts: You are now looking at Completed Orders. Your Completed orders are as follows:
cancelledOrdersListTts: You are now looking at Cancelled Orders. Your Cancelled orders are as follows:
orderDetailHint: Details of Order #{order_id} and the consisting items
shopDetailHint: This Order was placed from the Shop {shop_name}
couponDetailHint: This Order was placed with Coupon {coupon_code} of Value {currency}.{coupon_value}
orderItemDetailHint: You have {length} items in your Order #{order_id} placed from the Shop {shop_name}
